name: Things to Protect, Sana
expansion: Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: A New Story, Mami
expansion: Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in the original order.

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. If you revealed 1 or more cards, choose up to 1 yellow character from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: Mercernary's Battle Style, Felicia
expansion: Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story
ability: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

expansion: Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "I'm Even the Mightiest at Hoops!" is in your climax area, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent, and put up to 1 card from the top of your clock into your waiting room." (Damage may be canceled)

【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled during the turn this card was placed on the stage from your hand, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

expansion: Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.

expansion: Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story
ability: 【CONT】 You cannot play event cards or "Backup" from your hand.

name: Iroha Starting Out
expansion: Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Magic》 characters get +1000 power.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Oriko Mikuni
expansion: Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Magic》 characters, this card gets +3000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Magic》 characters, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.
flavor_text: I know exactly what I have to do!

name: Iroha Tamaki
expansion: Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Magic》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Magic》 characters you have ×500.
flavor_text: Welcome back. I've been waiting for you.

name: Tea for Three
expansion: Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story
ability: Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Magic》 character, put it into your hand, choose up to 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -3000 power until end of turn." (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavor_text: I might not be good at cooking, but I can make tea at least... right?

name: The Magical Girls' New Story
expansion: Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.

name: Believe in Your Memories
expansion: Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
